duties_responsibilities.duty: Prototype, develop, and refine machine learning models using best practices and established frameworks
Conduct experiments and evaluations to assess model performance and effectiveness
Optimize and adapt models for real-time, scalable, and efficient performance
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and develop technical plans
Implement robust and reusable data preprocessing and feature engineering pipelines
Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning, deep learning, and NLP

education_certification.credential: Master's or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related quantitative field
